steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4trke","text":"In a new PCR strip-tube/plate set up the following reaction for each sample:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6md0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2leqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eejs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8kc6f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8optv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9gris","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7lccr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"_dt-bold","0_1":"_dt-bold","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"_dt-bold","5_1":"_dt-bold"},"colWidths":[215,50],"data":[["Component","Volume"],["PCR dilution from previous step","3.3 µL"],["Ultra II End Prep Reaction Buffer","1.2 µL"],["Ultra II End Prep Enzyme Mix","0.5 µL"],["Nuclease-free water","5 µL"],["Total","10 µL"]],"guid":"4B9BF2D0E6D711EA94B0ED8B927B5F2B","legend":"","mergeCells":[],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"def5h","text":"Make a master mix of end-preparation reagents and nuclease-free water and aliquot into strip-tube/plate to improve reproducability.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":30},{"key":3,"length":1,"offset":105}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"asqg6","text":"If processing 96 samples pool   from each native barcoding reaction so as not to exceed a pool volume of   which would make the clean-up volume too large.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"10","guid":"F07F69A3E6D811EAB4850A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"5","guid":"F07F6A53E6D811EAB4850A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"},"2":{"data":{"amount":"2.5","guid":"F07F6ABBE6D811EAB4850A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"},"3":{"data":{"amount":"240","guid":"F07F6B21E6D811EAB4850A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2575f","text":"Add 0.4x volume of SPRI beads to the sample tube and mix gently by either flicking or pipetting. For example add   SPRI beads to   pooled one-pot barcoding reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":113,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"15c8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ogon","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bpo3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"96","guid":"473BDFB0660411EA80970FD0825407B7","id":"43442","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"240","guid":"44C75D40660411EA80970FD0825407B7","id":"43443","label":"","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9cic3","text":"0.4x volume of SPRI is sufficient to bind 400 bp amplicons in the presence of ligation buffer, do not use 1x as this will result in an excessive large bead pellet.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fscjv","text":"Mix by vortexing and pulse centrifuge to collect all liquid at the bottom of the tube. Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"148787F1E6D911EAB4850A58A9FEAC2A","id":"49289","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3trfe","text":"Place on magnetic rack and incubate for   or until the beads have pelleted and the supernatant is completely clear. Carefully remove and discard the supernatant, being careful not to touch the bead pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"487s9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"84D4C3A0660411EA80970FD0825407B7","id":"49290","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m699","text":"Add   SFB and resuspend beads completely by pipette mixing. Pulse centrifuge to collect all liquid at the bottom of the tube and place on the magnet. Remove supernatant and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5vad4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dohm3","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4vt0g","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fcmj5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","guid":"CE802DE0E6D911EA94B0ED8B927B5F2B","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4amtk","text":"SFB will remove excess adapter without damaging the adapter-protein complexes. Do not use 70% ethanol as in early clean-ups.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmjma","text":"Repeat steps 11.9 to perform a second SFB wash. Pulse centrifuge and remove any residual SFB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"filfp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2qaul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8vdur","text":"You do not need to allow to air dry with SFB washes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"548jn","text":"Add   of room-temperature  ethanol to bathe the pellet. Carefully remove and discard ethanol, being careful not to touch the bead pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4jko1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a3mh7","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2jh0p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4dg63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"C3B433C0E6D911EA94B0ED8B927B5F2B","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","guid":"16B0EC80E6EE11EA81AD5BFDDB8C412E","id":0,"label":"","unit":14}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5qt7s","text":"Only perform 1x 70% ethanol wash","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38gef","text":"Pulse centrifuge to collect all liquid at the bottom of the tube and carefully remove as much residual ethanol as possible using a P10 pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22ic9","text":"With the tube lid open incubate for   or until the pellet loses it's shine (if the pellet dries completely it will crack and become difficult to resuspend).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"apad6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"AC79B310E6D911EA94B0ED8B927B5F2B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95mt","text":"Resuspend pellet in     Tris pH 8.0, mix gently by either flicking or pipetting and incubate for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ao94t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","guid":"23098EC0660511EA80970FD0825407B7","id":"43444","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","guid":"42818700E6DC11EA83ABF106F1A80B40","id":0,"label":"","unit":28}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"279865B0660511EA80970FD0825407B7","id":"49291","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
